item.description:
So, for our first Meetup, let's get together to just get to know one another and play some party favorites like Scattagories, Taboo, and Balderdash. We can then get a feel for what types of games everyone plays and how often people would like to meet.

This first time we can meet at my home in Salem: 21 Lemon St. There should be room for everyone. Let's set the time to meet for 8 p.m. The street parking does not require a permit. Feel free to RSVP for friends and spouses, too.

(Just a warning, there are two cats in the household who will be kept in another room, should anyone have allergies.)

I do ask, if possible, that people chip in $1 for the cost of the meetup, as the website charges groups.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: First Board Games Meetup
